appinfo_list.name: Name
appinfo_list.value: Merlin Bird ID by Cornell Lab

app_descript:
Merlin Bird ID by Cornell Lab

Brief: Merlin Bird ID by Cornell Lab is a comprehensive app designed for bird enthusiasts and ornithologists of any skill level. Developed by the prestigious Cornell Lab of Ornithology, the app is an invaluable tool for identifying birds through songs, calls, and photos, and it offers the functionality to store sightings in a personal life list. Delve into the world of avian species with this user-friendly mobile application that delivers highly accurate results.

Core Features:

  • üéµ Identify bird songs and calls to recognize avian species by their unique sounds.
  • üì∏ Use the photo ID feature to identify birds from pictures.
  • üìî Curate and maintain a life list of bird sightings for personal record-keeping.
  • üåè Explore and discover lists of birds local to your area or any chosen location.
  • üïµÔ∏è Access a comprehensive bird guide to seek information about any bird in any corner of the world.

Pros:

  • üëç Uses state-of-the-art technology to provide highly accurate bird identifications.
  • üëç Offers an extensive database from Cornell's ornithology experts.
  • üëç User-friendly interface makes bird watching and identification accessible to all.
  • üëç Perfect educational tool for both avid birders and those new to the pastime.
  • üëç Actively contributes to conservation efforts by involving the user community in data collection.

Cons:

  • üëé Requires Android 5.0 or newer, possibly limiting access to users with older devices.
  • üëé A large amount of free space (1 GB) is needed, which might be considerable for some users.
  • üëé In areas with low biodiversity, the app might have less utility.
  • üëé Might need regular updates to keep the bird database current and accurate.
  • üëé Dependence on the quality of user-taken photos for identification may lead to occasional inaccuracies.

Price: üíµ Merlin Bird ID by Cornell Lab is available as a free app. There is no mention of in-app purchases, providing all its features at no additional cost.

Download Merlin Bird ID by Cornell Lab on Google Play and embark on a journey to explore the fascinating world of birds with a tap on your screen!
